channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: NPRのポッドキャスティング・チーフ、コリン・キャンベルにインタビュー。"ブロードキャスト・トゥ・ポッドキャスト "戦略や、新しいポッドキャスティングの状況についてなど（Ariel Shapiro/The Verge）
item.description:
Ariel Shapiro / The Verge:
An interview with NPR podcasting chief Collin Campbell on its “broadcast-to-podcast” strategy, navigating the new podcasting landscape, and more  —  Today, I have a preview of an interview with NPR's new podcasting chief, Collin Campbell.  Campbell, who is an alum of WNYC …

item.title: ウィキメディア・ロシアが閉鎖する中、元ウィキメディア・ロシアのディレクターが率いるクレムリン準拠のウィキペディア代替版Ruwikiが最近稼動した（Noam Cohen/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Noam Cohen / Bloomberg:
As Wikimedia Russia shuts down, a look at the Kremlin-compliant Wikipedia alternative Ruwiki, which recently went live, led by an ex-Wikimedia Russia director  —  A campaign to replace the country's Wikipedia with a more pliant alternative seems near completion.

item.title: AcastやiHeartMediaのようなポッドキャスト・ネットワークは、広告売上を増やしたり、番組をさまざまな言語に翻訳したりするために、どのようにAIツールをテストしているのか（Sara Guaglione/Digiday）
item.description:
Sara Guaglione / Digiday:
How podcast networks, like Acast and iHeartMedia, are testing AI tools to increase their ad sales, translate shows into different languages, and more  —  It seems it's not just big digital publishers like BuzzFeed and BDG looking to generative artificial intelligence tools as ways to streamline their sales process.

item.title: ボルチモアのいくつかの独立系出版社は、ボルチモア・サン紙の売却後、オンライントラフィック、購読者、寄付、ソーシャルメディアのフォロワーが急増している（Sarah Scire/Nieman Lab）。
item.description:
Sarah Scire / Nieman Lab:
Some independent outlets in Baltimore are seeing a spike in online traffic, subscribers, donations, and social media followers, after The Baltimore Sun's sale  —  “We're taking the opportunity to remind people that we are an independent, trustworthy news source in the Baltimore region — and they are responding.”

item.title: 情報筋Netflixは2024年4月上旬にHBO『セックス・アンド・ザ・シティ』のストリーミング配信を開始する予定だが、同シリーズのスピンオフ『アンド・ジャスト・ライク・ザット』はマックス独占のまま（John Koblin/New York Times）
item.description:
John Koblin / New York Times:
Sources: Netflix plans to begin streaming HBO's Sex and the City in early April 2024, but the series' spinoff And Just Like That will remain exclusive to Max  —  Media companies that had been reluctant to are increasingly offering shows to Netflix, which is pulling further ahead in the streaming wars.

item.title: 米国のアーティスト10人がMidjourney社を相手取って起こした集団訴訟の提出書類には、Midjourney社がトレーニングに使用したとされる16,000人のアーティストの名前が記載されている（James Tapper/The Guardian）。
item.description:
James Tapper / The Guardian:
A filing in a class action suit by 10 US artists against Midjourney and others lists 16,000 artist names whose work Midjourney had allegedly used for training  —  US lawyers approached about class action against Midjourney and other AI firms accused of ‘copyright laundering’

item.title: 2023年、中国での興行収入ベスト10にアメリカ映画はランクインせず。
item.description:
New York Times:
In 2023, no US films ranked among the 10 highest grossing in China, which is producing more high-quality movies that resonate with domestic audiences  —  No American films ranked among the 10 highest grossing in China last year as viewers who once flocked to foreign blockbusters continued to disappear.

item.title: ロサンゼルス・タイムズ紙のレイオフは、同紙が2023年に立ち上げたラテン系に特化した「De Los」とワシントンDC支局を直撃した（Hanaa' Tameez/Nieman Lab）。
item.description:
Hanaa' Tameez / Nieman Lab:
The Los Angeles Times' layoffs have hit the outlet's Latino-focused vertical De Los, which was launched in 2023, and the Washington, DC bureau  —  “We are not in turmoil.  We have a real plan,” the paper's owner, billionaire businessman Dr. Patrick Soon-Shiong, said.

item.title: Google、検索広告キャンペーンを構築するためのGoogle Adsの新しいGemini搭載チャットベースツールを発表、米国と英国の全英語広告主にベータ版を提供（Aisha Malik/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Aisha Malik / TechCrunch:
Google unveils a new Gemini-powered chat-based tool in Google Ads to build Search ad campaigns, out in beta to all English language advertisers in the US and UK  —  Google announced today that Gemini, its family of multimodal large language models, now powers the conversational experience within the Google Ads platform.

item.title: Netflixによると、同社のサービスにおけるゲームへのユーザー関与は2023年に3倍になり、『グランド・セフト・オート』はこれまでで最も成功したローンチとなった（Pranav Dixit/Engadget）
item.description:
Pranav Dixit / Engadget:
Netflix says user engagement with games on its service tripled in 2023 and Grand Theft Auto has become its most successful launch to date  —  The company added the Grand Theft Auto trilogy to its offerings late in the year.  —  Netflix said that user engagement with games on the service tripled in 2023.

item.title: 英国政府が委託した調査によると、BBCはオンライン・ローカルニュース提供において「商業プロバイダーの1対1の代替」にはなっていない（Charlotte Tobitt/Press Gazette）。
item.description:
Charlotte Tobitt / Press Gazette:
A study commissioned by the UK government says the BBC does not serve as a “one-to one substitute for commercial providers in online local news provision”  —  Ofcom will publish annual report on BBC position in local news sector.  —  The BBC's online local news output does not add up to a …

item.title: Netflixの共同CEOであるテッド・サランドスは、WWEとの契約は2024年に予想されるコンテンツへの170億ドルの支出の "範囲内 "であり、Netflixのスポーツ戦略の変更ではないと語っている（Todd Spangler/Variety）
item.description:
Todd Spangler / Variety:
Netflix co-CEO Ted Sarandos says the WWE deal “fits within” its anticipated $17B spending on content in 2024 and is not a change to Netflix's sports strategy  —  Netflix extended its lead as the world's biggest premium video-streaming platform — pulling in a better …

item.title: ネットフリックスは、「リニア資産」の買収には興味がなく、さらなるM&Aによって「競争環境が大きく変わる」とは考えていないと述べている（Peter White/Deadline）
item.description:
Peter White / Deadline:
Netflix says it's not interested in acquiring “linear assets”, and it does not believe further M&A will “materially change the competitive environment”  —  Netflix is often talked about a potential buyer for big Hollywood studios as the latest set of M&A rumors swirl …

item.title: Netflixは、広告付きプランが利用可能な一部の国で、広告なしのベーシックプランを2024年第2四半期にカナダとイギリスを皮切りに廃止する計画だ（Emma Roth/The Verge）。
item.description:
Emma Roth / The Verge:
Netflix plans to to retire its ad-free Basic plan in some countries where ad-supported plans are available, starting with Canada and the UK in Q2 2024  —  Although Netflix no longer allows new or returning members to sign up for the ad-free Basic subscription that costs $11.99 per month …

item.title: メモタイムCEOが複数の部門にわたる削減を発表、同社は「熱心に」経費を削減したが「まだやるべきことがある」と語る（Max Tani/@maxwelltani）
item.description:
Max Tani / @maxwelltani:
Memo: Time CEO announces cuts across several departments and says the company has “diligently reduced” expenses but “there is still more work to be done”  —  Memo to staff from Time magazine CEO Jess Sibley announcing the cuts, saying the company has “diligently reduced our expenses” but “there is still more work to be done.” [image]
